name: Cyber Tails
description:
Description

Cyber Tails (old -- Laser x Laser = Nothing, or Cyber Tentacles) -- Fast action game prototype, where you must destroy all enemies around you. What can you do?

Control

- Movement from one corner to another (RMB)
- Attack around you (LMB)
- Attack breaks your movement
- Attack richoshet projectiles of red bots.

Afterwords

- Game have 10 different levels, but after 10 level you begin from 0 again.

- Alright, i created what i created in this period. Just good luck!
On start, I planned other gameplay more in mix of Tomb of the mask + Katana zero(with rooms, doors and etc.), but simplify this for time)
But, enjoy it, if you can :)

- Now blue bots have more chances for missing, so i think you can stop spam LMB :) Basically, i want for counter attack when you and bot simultaneously attack, but in jam period time is not my friend and now it will be a new feature, i think :(

- I try  to create a fast action game. After Katana Zero speedruns all becoming very sloooow for me :)

-  Appreciate feedback and any ideas. For example, i think very good idea with attack in movement in this conceptions, without stop. But what do you think about it?

Ludum Dare Page for your ratings:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/ld45-cyber-tentacles
